item.title: About
item.description: I am a writer, scholar and political commentator interested in social justice and political judgment, the rise of new ideologies, and democracy’s troubles with capitalism. I draw on history, philosophy and sociology as I seek to produce politically salient and critical analyses of modern societies. I am currently a Professor of Social and Political Science at the University of Kentâ€™s Brussels School of International Studies, and honorary fellow at the Institute for Global Sustainable Development, University of Warwick.
